description.english: A bulletin board website where Discord users can connect based on shared interests. Users can create profiles and use tags to categorize their interests.
description.japanese: 共通の興味に基づいてユーザーがつながる場所。プロフィールを作成し、興味をタグで整理できる友達募集用のDiscord掲示板

description.english: Using NovelAI's API, I created AI chatbots for Discord. they're not perfect, but I sure learned a lot of new things while making them
description.japanese: NovelAIのAPIを使って、Discord用のAIチャットボットを作りました。完璧じゃないけど色々なこと学んだ

description.english: A simple zodiac calculator, using plain HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I made it since my friends had it as a school project, even though I wasn't classmates with them and no one probably knows it exists
description.japanese: 友達が学校のプロジェクトでやってたんで、普通のHTML、CSS、JavaScriptで十二宮計算機を作りました。クラスメートじゃないけどね、多分誰もこのサイトの存在を知らないんだろうな

name.japanese: ハズレのポートフォリオ

description.english: After learning a bit of HTML and CSS properly, I went ahead and tried making a new and improved version of my old one, all with responsive design. I never finished it though, since found out about React and Expressjs. It also has a language switch feature
description.japanese: 初めてポートフォリオ作ろとしてたけど、完成する前にReactとかの存在に気づいてやめた。言語切り替え機能もある

name.japanese: ザ・チェビー・アーカイブ

description.english: This was the first website I built, without any prior knowledge to HTML or CSS. Just JavaScript. I brute forced my way with ChatGPT. it's kind of terrible, but it's my first anyway
description.japanese: 1番最初に作ったウェブサイト。当時はJavaScriptしか知らなかったけどChatGPT使って無理やりで組み立てた
